name: l4w
description: An engine + web editor for tile-based web games

dependenciesDocumentation.compression: compression middleware for express, required for GZipping of textual responses
dependenciesDocumentation.connect-session-sequelize: session store for connect-session using sequelize
dependenciesDocumentation.sequelize: ORM framework for Node.js. Cant update to v6, import method change and I could not get it work with sequelize-auto modules. It is a CommonJS module, so importing can be tricky

devDependenciesDocumentation.@types/bluebird: TypeScript definitions for Bluebird implementation of Promise. Required by sequelize
devDependenciesDocumentation.@types/express-session: TypeScript definitions for express-session. Upgrading to versions > 1.17.0 caused compilation issues
devDependenciesDocumentation.@types/validator: TypeScript definitions for validator. Required by sequelize
devDependenciesDocumentation.grunt-babel: Grunt Plugin for Babel, a Javascript compilator to backward-compatible code
devDependenciesDocumentation.grunt-contrib-uglify: Grunt Plugin for UglifyJS, a Javascript minimizer
devDependenciesDocumentation.heroku: CLI for Heroku, required for launching the app as Heroku does in Production
devDependenciesDocumentation.vue-loader: Vue single-file component loader for Webpack
devDependenciesDocumentation.vue-style-loader: Vue.js style loader module for Webpack
